stressBiomarkers.title: Stress Biomarkers
stressBiomarkers.description: Revolutionary cell-free DNA measurement for accurate stress level assessment
stressBiomarkers.detailedDescription: Cell-free DNA has been developed as a biomarker for preventive medicine over the past decade. However, its detection has remained extremely time-consuming and expensive. With our patent, we have developed a rapid and accessible method requiring just a drop of blood.

holisticAnalysis.title: Holistic Analysis
holisticAnalysis.description: Comprehensive evaluation of biochemical, physical, and psychological stress
holisticAnalysis.detailedDescription: Stress is multidimensional—one's health can be highly compromised in one area, affecting others. To address this, we integrate physical, psychological, and biological assessments to understand individuals as a whole.

dataIntegration.title: Data Integration
dataIntegration.description: Unified platform bringing all health metrics into one accessible dashboard
dataIntegration.detailedDescription: To fully comprehend these data points, they must be analyzed together. We are building a system that unifies data analysis and simulation into one accessible dashboard.

professionalFocus.title: Professional Focus
professionalFocus.description: Tailored solutions for medical professionals and HR departments
professionalFocus.detailedDescription: We provide a platform that enables medical professionals and HR departments to efficiently manage their patients in one centralized system.

visionPage.title: Our Vision
visionPage.intro1: Today's healthcare only treats problems after you get sick. This makes staying healthy expensive, stressful, and often too late.
visionPage.intro2: At HOMEOS, we believe good health is a right for everyone. You deserve tools that help you take control of your health before problems start.
visionPage.intro3: We want a future where checking your health is as easy as checking the weather. A world where health information is simple to understand and use, helping you make better choices to stay healthy and live longer.
visionPage.nowContent: We're creating easy-to-use tools to measure and manage your body's stress levels, making it simpler to stay healthy.
visionPage.fiveYearsContent: HOMEOS will be known for helping people track and improve their health. Doctors and individuals will use our system to get better results.
visionPage.tenYearsContent: Our technology will be used in hospitals and clinics everywhere, making personalized health tracking normal for everyone.
visionPage.fifteenYearsContent: HOMEOS will set the standard for health management. Science-based health insights will be a normal part of everyday life.
visionPage.goalContent: To build the most helpful and easy-to-use system for managing body stress, turning complex health data into clear, useful information.
visionPage.whyContent1: Because healthcare should be for everyone and should help you prevent problems, not just treat them.
visionPage.whyContent2: We're challenging the old way of thinking that only deals with sickness after it happens. We create tools that make health information easy to understand, so you and your doctor can take action before problems start.
visionPage.dreamFutureContent: A world where staying healthy is normal, where people feel confident, not confused, about their health.
visionPage.benefit3: Just clear understanding and control over your health.
visionPage.conclusion: Join us in creating a better future for health—because understanding your body is the key to staying well.
